overrides.shortHint: GT3 road: rear wing shifts diffuser balance; extra clicks may be needed for long sweepers.
overrides.fullHint: On BoP-limited GT3 aero, rear wing adds stability through fast esses but watch straight-line drag on long road courses.

overrides.shortHint: GT3 road: rake strongly influences diffuser stall; small changes matter.
overrides.fullHint: Higher rear ride height increases rake and can wake up the diffuser but risks rear instability over curbs on road layouts.

overrides.shortHint: GT3 road: target hot pressures tightly; adjust to keep within 0.1 bar window.
overrides.fullHint: GT3 slicks reward precise pressures—use telemetry to keep hot pressures in the sweet spot for stint-length grip.

overrides.shortHint: Prototype road: front aero changes alter brake balance feel; expect stronger platform effects.
overrides.fullHint: High-downforce prototypes react sharply to front wing moves; combine with damper tweaks to preserve platform in fast corners.

overrides.shortHint: Stiffer bars tie into hybrid recovery; mind kerb compliance on road courses.
overrides.fullHint: Prototype anti-roll changes affect aero platform and hybrid stability—keep kerb compliance for chicanes.

overrides.shortHint: Short-oval: camber split controls tire temp; bias for sustained LF heat.
overrides.fullHint: On short ovals, more RF negative camber helps mid-corner bite but watch LF temps late in a run.

overrides.shortHint: Rear toe-steer sets entry attitude; too much can hurt straight speed.
overrides.fullHint: Toe-out on the RR can free entry on tight ovals but adds scrub on the straights—balance with ride heights.

overrides.shortHint: Keep front valence off the track; splitter strikes hurt short-oval rhythm.
overrides.fullHint: Slightly higher front ride height prevents bottoming over bumps and maintains consistent aero seal.

overrides.shortHint: Superspeedway: wing trim is about drag; stability comes from platform.
overrides.fullHint: On superspeedways, small rear wing reductions cut drag but must be paired with stable rake to avoid pack aero push.

overrides.shortHint: Lower platform reduces drag; be wary of porpoising in the draft.
overrides.fullHint: Running the car lower down the straight reduces drag but may oscillate in wake—monitor telemetry for bottoming.

overrides.shortHint: Road circuits need stable braking; bias tweaks change trail-brake feel.
overrides.fullHint: Shift bias forward for downhill braking zones; rearward bias helps rotation but risks lockups into hairpins.
